name: Blackjoe
description:
Do you like coffee? Do you like dice? Do you like super-short tabletop games with adaptable rules? Have you ever been accused of being perhaps a smidgen melodramatic?

If you answered "yes" to any of the above, Blackjoe is the game for you!

This FREE one-page micro-RPG can be played with zero prep in a minute or less! The PDF is lovingly doodled-upon and filled with wacky prompts to keep the joe flowing.

If heavily formatted documents aren't your thing, there's also a more straightforward black-and-white PDF, so everyone can play!

If you enjoy Blackjoe and want to see more TTRPGs from me, you can make my day by leaving a comment! If you're able, you can also donate either by downloading the game again or by visiting my Ko-fi. Regardless, thank you SO much for playing!
